absorption (inference-rule)¶

Definition¶

absorption is a well-known and valid inference_rule in propositional-logic.

Formal definition¶

\[\left(P \implies Q\right) \vdash \left(P \implies P \land Q\right)\]

Python implementation¶

  • AbsorptionDeclaration (python class)

  • AbsorptionInclusion (python class)

Bibliography¶

  • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Absorption_(logic)

punctilious
